bio: We believe in the power of cryptocurrency bringing opportunities to all of us.
impactDescription: I believe in the power of cryptocurrency and the opportunities of freedom it provides and Optimism is one of those ways. While I may not be a developer, I am trying to use influence and high quality content, including relationship building, to bring a greater awareness of crypto around the world. And I believe it's a good work we can do across the board to better us as a society. And I hope that continues to build within the collective.
contributionDescription:
I have been around the Crypto space as a whole now for about 4 years. In that time I've learned a lot, been scammed (like all of us pretty much), invested, gone down the rabbit hole, and have joined some amazing communities along the way that are like family. 

I believe in the power of cryptocurrency and the opportunities of freedom it provides and Optimism is one of those ways. While I may not be a developer, I am trying to use influence and high quality content, including relationship building, to bring a greater awareness of crypto around the world. And I believe it's a good work we can do across the board to better us as a society. 

I'll be continuing to do that with our without help but I sure would love help and support along the way so I'm trying to make a statement for that here.
